name: Venue.ink
headline: Software for tattoo artists and studios
description: Venue.ink is a booking app for tattoo artists and studios. Receive bookings, manage your calendar, chat with clients and get paid. We help artists spend more time on art, and less time on admin.

founders.name: Jason Goldlist, Founder
founders.description:
I started my career as a business analyst at McKinsey & Company. After a quick operations tour at the Vancouver Olympic Games and an MBA at INSEAD, I worked at A Place for Mom in Seattle. I was an early employee at Wealthsimple (co-founded by Brett Huneycutt & Rudy Adler, prev. YC S10) before founding Venue. 

I live in Toronto with my wife Tenielle our two boys (Abe is 10, and Reuben is 7).

founders.name: Danilo Cabello, Founder
founders.description: I am computer engineer, born in Brazil, moved to Canada in 2012, I love seeing people using my creations, most recently working with WebRTC, React, Typescript and Ruby on Rails. Love to discuss and talk about tech, processes, ideas, product development.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f69fdc3bc7be3162018c7_text-made-by-artists.png)
# Tattoo booking that’s as smooth as your lines
Venue is a booking app for tattoo artists that combines your customizable booking form, calendar, deposits, payments, and conversations with clients in one place.
[Try Venue rn](https://venue.ink/<http:/venue.ink/sign-up>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f4b55b49657a34b437e80_smooth-as-your-lines.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f7df44cd1b3aa75db80a4_text-get-your-shit-together.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f3171bac7fb86b6e26877_banner-hiw.png)
We're constantly building features to help artists save time, reduce back and forth, and get booked faster.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675c884ed74255e26c27cd43_cherub-archer.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675c88605ec7c38e41355e18_cherub-busy.png)
### Upload flash
Flash can be uploaded in bulk or individually. Clients can browse flash and see available sizes and placements. You can choose to make your flash non-repeatable and communicate that to your clients.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f5a13e2ebe46fa2b2b699_sticker-bird.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f525a528dc107196bba88_feature-flash.jpg)
### Share your personalized booking link
You can share your booking link to your social media accounts and add it as a plug-in for your website. Clients can use your booking link to submit proposals or choose from your available artwork.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f5c4f5e7d150b893b228f_sticker-heart-girl.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f4cacd95bf5ffe0a423d4_feature-flash.jpg)
### Review requests
Clients can upload references and inspiration images for you to review custom and flash requests!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f75edd95bf5ffe0c16b52_sticker-cherubbaby.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f5431a71fc3ba4992940d_feature-review-requests.jpg)
### Fully customizable booking form
You can ask questions and collect information by creating your own booking form. You can chat with us over DM to change your form at any time!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f76bbc3bc7be316279fd6_sticker-palms.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f6c075e7d150b8945aadc_feature-booking-form.png)
### Accept deposits
Our app makes it easy to include booking terms when you request deposits. You can accept deposits with credit card or apple pay and even allow clients to pay in installments using Affirm.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f774cf4ae696189d6311c_sticker-devilhand.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f6d0c1b3337145ec56976_feature-accept-deposits.jpg)
### Client chat
You can keep clients out of your DM’s, capture reference images, and their booking info in one easy to reference place through client chat. Clients can ask questions, and you can guide them through your creative process in our chat feature.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f7815d95bf5ffe0c2bc91_sticker-dagger.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f6e8f6879da4dad09df49_feature-chat.jpg)
### Customizable calendar
Schedule your way! You can propose times to schedule a client or choose to give clients control and choose from your calendar. You can create half day or full day time slots to prevent clients from booking in the middle of the day. We mean it - scheduling that fits how you work.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f78dfe4ca9512ef671e36_sticker-banana.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f6e16b49657a34b5c1866_feature-calendar.jpg)
### Text reminders
We send text reminders to your clients 24 hours before their appointment, which cuts down on no-shows. If a client needs to reschedule, you can use our last minute booking link to fill the slot.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f7a0d528dc10719873f56_sticker-moon.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f6f95ec9329281897797d_feature-text-reminder.jpg)
### Accept full payment
Users can start accepting full payment using Venue. We’ll calculate the tax, encourage tipping, and pay you out the same as usual with no cost to Artists.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f797eb0486ab0bf26f553_sticker-payment.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f70375e7d150b89486a76_feature-payments.jpg)
Insta DMs are unmanageable
venue has simplified my booking process a lot! i appreciate that clients can book in all on their own for flash pieces.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac183ab44498f07bc31a3d/67a6449a7052e47873f49760_bloodinthesoil.png)@bloodinthesoil](https://venue.ink/<https:/venue.ink/bloodinthesoil>)
No more emails
It's such a quick and resourceful way to book clients... No more back and forth through emails
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac183ab44498f07bc31a3d/67a6461a92a4eb6395084938_orion.png)@orioninkllc](https://venue.ink/<https:/venue.ink/orioninkllc>)
<3
I absolutely love everything about Venue! 
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac183ab44498f07bc31a3d/67a644e6644167601671c452_khushi.png)@tatsbykhushi](https://venue.ink/<https:/venue.ink/tatsbykhushi>)
Streamlined booking
For a silly artist with awful ADHD, Venue helps me streamline my booking across my multiple studios that I work out of
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac183ab44498f07bc31a3d/67a6469440408ce9c3338475_jn.png)@jn.ink](https://venue.ink/<https:/venue.ink/@jn.ink>)
Focus on my art
I can focus more on my art and personal life and know my clients are still being tended to with text alerts and such.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac183ab44498f07bc31a3d/67a6438ba43f34622b280d91_inkbyway.png)@inkbywayofday](https://venue.ink/<https:/venue.ink/inkbywayofday>)
Helps my ADHD
It’s so easy to use and it helps so much with my ADHD
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac183ab44498f07bc31a3d/67a635289b9f142592b2bd70_chops.png)@_chops13](https://venue.ink/<https:/venue.ink/_chops13>)
Just send a link
I can just send a link and no longer have to do any back and forth.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac183ab44498f07bc31a3d/67a646d6cbc46d613ff31004_crybaby.png)@crybaby.angell](https://venue.ink/<https:/venue.ink/@crybaby.angell>)
Can't be beat
It beats anything I’ve tried in the past
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac183ab44498f07bc31a3d/67a644e6644167601671c452_khushi.png)@tatsbykhushi](https://venue.ink/<https:/venue.ink/tatsbykhushi>)
It's so convenient
I love how it looks and how convenient it is! Definitely my favorite booking app I've tried
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac183ab44498f07bc31a3d/67a6453d6797b1fe56274506_wisteria.png)@wisteriadawn](https://venue.ink/<https:/venue.ink/wisteriadawn>)
Simplicity
i love that i can do everything in one place
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac183ab44498f07bc31a3d/67a6441f192cf783846f86ba_ghoulish.png)@ghoulishtats](https://venue.ink/<https:/venue.ink/ghoulishtats>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f7bf9f4ae696189d92ec1_text-faq.png)
What is Venue?
Think of Venue as your personal booking assistant (without needing to hire one.) We help make booking, scheduling, taking deposits, and having conversations with your clients easy.
How much does Venue cost?
We don't have a monthly subscription. To cover our costs, there's a booking fee your clients pay when they book you. This makes Venue free for artists.
It's free for artists — what's the catch?
There's no catch! The booking fee your clients pay is 10% of your deposit. So if you have a $100 deposit, your client is charged $110, which covers Stripe's card processing fees too.Your client is clearly shown a breakdown for how much they're paying in deposits and the booking fee so there's no ambiguity how much to deduct from the final payment. However, if you prefer to take on the booking fee yourself, you can choose to have it deducted from your deposit in the Payment setting under Profile.
Who is Venue for?
Venue is for tattoo artists who manage their own booking and want to consolidate all their booking, scheduling, deposits, and client conversations in one place to make booking painless and stress-free.
How do I get paid?
We partner with Stripe to get you paid. When you create a Venue account, you also connect with Stripe so we can pay directly into your bank account. The first deposit payout takes up to 5 business days and the following payouts are within 1-2 business days.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f7437c7e72aec121c0cf8_venue-drop-web.svg)
Start booking free
Tattoo admin while you chill
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/67605334e7f57ebaa0d33063_time-after-time.png)

Admin hours saved
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f7437c7e72aec121c0cf8_venue-drop-web.svg)
Built for tattoo
Flexiblelike you
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/67605200c6505c83dee951cf_money-man.png)
90%
Clients tip using Venue
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675b3ce2dbcaa9d787c28645_banana.png)
Let's befriends
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/676056bbbb645790abc5aa65_script-instagram.svg)](https://venue.ink/<https:/www.instagram.com/venue.ink>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/6760569666509dba734af197_script-threads.svg)](https://venue.ink/<https:/www.threads.net/@venue.ink>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/6760566ccaae97d69511249a_script-youtube.svg)](https://venue.ink/<https:/www.youtube.com/@VenueInk>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/676055ebfecd978f38de55be_script-pinterest.svg)](https://venue.ink/<https:/www.pinterest.com/venueink/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/6760547725274a647f3aee57_tattooing-hand.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f7171183c17fac56c32c3_fullwidth-hands.jpg)
### Free yourself from emails and DMs
Venue makes booking, scheduling, taking deposits, and communicating with clients easy.
[Try Venue rn](https://venue.ink/<http:/venue.ink/sign-up>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675c4537256a9b374176154a_footer-phone.png)
Let me in

# Tattoo booking that’s as smooth as your lines
Venue is a booking app for tattoo artists that combines your customizable booking form, calendar, deposits, payments, and conversations with clients in one place.
Try Venue rn⟨3⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f4b55b49657a34b437e80_smooth-as-your-lines.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f7df44cd1b3aa75db80a4_text-get-your-shit-together.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f3171bac7fb86b6e26877_banner-hiw.png)
We're constantly building features to help artists save time, reduce back and forth, and get booked faster.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675c884ed74255e26c27cd43_cherub-archer.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675c88605ec7c38e41355e18_cherub-busy.png)
### Upload flash
Flash can be uploaded in bulk or individually. Clients can browse flash and see available sizes and placements. You can choose to make your flash non-repeatable and communicate that to your clients.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f5a13e2ebe46fa2b2b699_sticker-bird.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f525a528dc107196bba88_feature-flash.jpg)
### Share your personalized booking link
You can share your booking link to your social media accounts and add it as a plug-in for your website. Clients can use your booking link to submit proposals or choose from your available artwork.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f5c4f5e7d150b893b228f_sticker-heart-girl.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f4cacd95bf5ffe0a423d4_feature-flash.jpg)
### Review requests
Clients can upload references and inspiration images for you to review custom and flash requests!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f75edd95bf5ffe0c16b52_sticker-cherubbaby.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f5431a71fc3ba4992940d_feature-review-requests.jpg)
### Fully customizable booking form
You can ask questions and collect information by creating your own booking form. You can chat with us over DM to change your form at any time!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f76bbc3bc7be316279fd6_sticker-palms.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f6c075e7d150b8945aadc_feature-booking-form.png)
### Accept deposits
Our app makes it easy to include booking terms when you request deposits. You can accept deposits with credit card or apple pay and even allow clients to pay in installments using Affirm.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f774cf4ae696189d6311c_sticker-devilhand.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f6d0c1b3337145ec56976_feature-accept-deposits.jpg)
### Client chat
You can keep clients out of your DM’s, capture reference images, and their booking info in one easy to reference place through client chat. Clients can ask questions, and you can guide them through your creative process in our chat feature.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f7815d95bf5ffe0c2bc91_sticker-dagger.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f6e8f6879da4dad09df49_feature-chat.jpg)
### Customizable calendar
Schedule your way! You can propose times to schedule a client or choose to give clients control and choose from your calendar. You can create half day or full day time slots to prevent clients from booking in the middle of the day. We mean it - scheduling that fits how you work.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f78dfe4ca9512ef671e36_sticker-banana.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f6e16b49657a34b5c1866_feature-calendar.jpg)
### Text reminders
We send text reminders to your clients 24 hours before their appointment, which cuts down on no-shows. If a client needs to reschedule, you can use our last minute booking link to fill the slot.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f7a0d528dc10719873f56_sticker-moon.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ac1839b44498f07bc318a0/675f6f95ec9329281897797d_feature-text-reminder.jpg)
### Accept full payment
Users can start accepting full payment using Venue. We’ll calculate the tax, encourage tipping, and pay you out the same as usual with no cost to Artists.

generated_description:
**Venue.ink: Simplifying Tattoo Booking**

Founded in 2023 and hailing from Toronto, Canada, Venue.ink is shaking up the tattoo industry with its innovative software designed specifically for tattoo artists and studios. Initially launched as a booking app, Venue.ink allows artists to handle their appointments, communicate with clients, and receive payments—all in one smooth platform. The goal is simple: empower artists to focus more on their craft and less on the administrative grind.

### Core Features
- **Customizable Booking Forms:** Artists can create tailored booking forms, collect client information, and make the whole process smoother.
- **Integrated Calendar & Scheduling:** No more juggling multiple calendars. Venue.ink’s customizable calendar lets artists manage their time efficiently. 
- **Client Communication:** A built-in chat function keeps everything organized—artists can talk to clients without losing important details in the chaos of DMs.
- **Payment Solutions:** With features for accepting deposits and full payments, including installment plans through Affirm, artists can manage their finances seamlessly.
- **Text Reminders:** Automatic reminders to clients help reduce no-shows and keep everything on track.

### Why Venue.ink?
This platform is not just about managing bookings—it's a solution aimed at enhancing the artist-client relationship by making the entire interaction more fluid. Venue.ink streamlines administrative tasks while incorporating features like bulk upload for flash designs, direct payment processing with Stripe, and real-time scheduling that can adapt to how each artist works.

It's worth noting that while Venue.ink charges a booking fee (10% of deposits) to clients, artists can use the platform for free, making it an appealing option for tattoo professionals looking to cut down on overhead.

### Community and Growth
With a team of nine and the backing of Y Combinator’s Batch W22, Venue.ink is rapidly building a community of tattoo artists who appreciate the platform's ease of use. Their testimonials highlight how Venue.ink not only saves time but also enhances their focus on art—an essential aspect when creativity is at the forefront of their work.

You can explore more about Venue at their website: [Venue.ink](https://venue.ink) and see firsthand how it’s revolutionizing the tattoo booking experience. 

In sum, Venue.ink isn’t just making tattoo bookings easier; it's giving artists back their time and helping them better serve their clients. If you’re in the tattoo industry and find yourself buried in admin tasks, Venue might just be the assistant you didn’t know you needed.
